mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCRAP( SCRAP_NO, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NICK, SCRAP_DATE ) VALUES( SEQ_SCRAP_NO.NEXTVAL, #{member_no}, #{board_no}, #{member_nick}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCRAP WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} AND BOARD_NO = #{board_no}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS allBoardCount FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN SCRAP S ON B.MEMBER_NO = S.MEMBER_NO
WHERE B.BOARD_GROUP_NO = #{board_group_no}
AND S.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND S.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR S.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND REGEXP_LIKE (B.BOARD_TAG_NAME, '^HTML|^JAVA|^CSS|^C|^JS|^SQL|^PYTHON')
AND LOWER(B.BOARD_TAG_NAME) LIKE '%'||#{board_tag_name}||'%'

SELECT rn, board_no, board_group_no, board_tag_name, board_title, board_date, board_hit_count, board_like_count, board_report_count, board_file_check, bgroup_name, member_nick, board_comment_count, scrap_no FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT S.BOARD_NO ,B.BOARD_GROUP_NO ,B.BOARD_TAG_NAME ,B.BOARD_TITLE ,B.BOARD_DATE ,B.BOARD_HIT_COUNT ,B.BOARD_LIKE_COUNT ,B.BOARD_REPORT_COUNT ,B.BOARD_FILE_CHECK ,G.BGROUP_NAME ,S.MEMBER_NICK ,S.SCRAP_NO ,COUNT(C.BOARD_NO) AS board_comment_count
FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN BGROUP G ON B.BOARD_GROUP_NO = G.BOARD_GROUP_NO INNER JOIN SCRAP S ON B.BOARD_NO = S.BOARD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN BCOMMENT C ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO
WHERE S.BOARD_NO IN (SELECT BOARD_NO FROM SCRAP WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}) AND S.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
WHERE B.BOARD_GROUP_NO = #{board_group_no}
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND S.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR S.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND REGEXP_LIKE (B.BOARD_TAG_NAME, '^HTML|^JAVA|^CSS|^C|^JS|^SQL|^PYTHON')
AND LOWER(B.BOARD_TAG_NAME) LIKE '%'||#{board_tag_name}||'%'
GROUP BY S.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_GROUP_NO, B.BOARD_TAG_NAME, B.BOARD_TITLE,B.BOARD_DATE,B.BOARD_HIT_COUNT,B.BOARD_LIKE_COUNT,B.BOARD_REPORT_COUNT,B.BOARD_FILE_CHECK,G.BGROUP_NAME,S.MEMBER_NICK,S.SCRAP_NO
ORDER BY B.BOARD_DATE DESC
ORDER BY B.BOARD_DATE DESC
ORDER BY B.BOARD_HIT_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY B.BOARD_LIKE_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY board_comment_count DESC
) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
